education_text.0: Mockapetris graduated from the      Boston Latin School Boston Latin School in 1966, received his bachelor's degrees in physics and electrical engineering from the      Massachusetts Institute of Technology Massachusetts Institute of Technology in 1971 and his doctorate in information and computer science from the      redirect    University of California at Irvine University of California at Irvine in 1982Mockapetris graduated from the      Boston Latin School Boston Latin School in 1966, received his bachelor's degrees in physics and electrical engineering from the      Massachusetts Institute of Technology Massachusetts Institute of Technology in 1971 and his doctorate in information and computer science from the      redirect    University of California at Irvine University of California at Irvine in 1982
